```{r echo=FALSE}
#library(ggplot2)
#mu <- 7e-8
#g = 1
df_2$time <- g*((df_2$left_time_boundary + df_2$right_time_boundary)/2)/mu
p.cross <- ggplot(df_2) +
  geom_step(aes(x = time, y=1/(2*lambda_1*mu), color="lambda_1")) +
  geom_step(aes(x = time, y=1/(2*lambda_2*mu), color="lambda_2")) +
  geom_step(aes(x = time, y=1/(2*lambda_3*mu), color="lambda_3")) +
  geom_step(aes(x = time, y=1/(2*lambda_4*mu), color="lambda_4")) +
  geom_step(aes(x = time, y=1/(2*lambda_5*mu), color="lambda_5")) +
  scale_color_manual(name="Legend", 
                     values = c("lambda_1"="blue","lambda_2"="orange","lambda_3"="green", "lambda_4"="black", "lambda_5" = "yellow"),
                     labels= c("lambda_1"="Run_1","lambda_2"="Run_2","lambda_3"="Run_3","lambda_4"="Run_4","lambda_5"="Run_5")) + 
  scale_x_log10() +
  xlab("Time (years, log scale)")  + ylim(0,1e+4) +
  ylab("Effective population size") + ggtitle("Morocco") +
  theme_minimal()
personal_theme = theme(plot.title = 
                         element_text(hjust = 0.5))
p.cross + personal_theme
```

CROSS COALESCENCE

```{r echo=FALSE}

Iran_ND = read.table("/home/taliadoros/Desktop/phd_projects/Ptt/New_full/Newest/MSMC2/vcf_from_bam2/pops/all_chroms/Full_table_IR_ND", header = TRUE)

Iran_ND$time <- g*((Iran_ND$left_time_boundary + Iran_ND$right_time_boundary)/2*1000)/mu
Iran_ND$crossrate_1 <-with(Iran_ND, (lambda_1)/((lambda_00+lambda_11)/2))
Iran_ND$crossrate_2 <-with(Iran_ND, (lambda_2)/((lambda_00+lambda_11)/2))
Iran_ND$crossrate_3 <-with(Iran_ND, (lambda_3)/((lambda_00+lambda_11)/2))
Iran_ND$crossrate_4 <-with(Iran_ND, (lambda_4)/((lambda_00+lambda_11)/2))
Iran_ND$crossrate_5 <-with(Iran_ND, (lambda_5)/((lambda_00+lambda_11)/2))
p.cross_Ir_ND <- ggplot(Iran_ND) +
  geom_step(aes(x = time, y=crossrate_1, color="lambda_1")) +
  geom_step(aes(x = time, y=crossrate_2, color="lambda_2")) +
  geom_step(aes(x = time, y=crossrate_3, color="lambda_3")) +
  geom_step(aes(x = time, y=crossrate_4, color="lambda_4")) +
  geom_step(aes(x = time, y=crossrate_5, color="lambda_5")) +
  scale_color_manual(name="Legend", 
                     values = c("lambda_1"="blue","lambda_2"="orange","lambda_3"="green", "lambda_4"="black", "lambda_5" = "yellow"),
                     labels= c("lambda_1"="Run_1","lambda_2"="Run_2","lambda_3"="Run_3","lambda_4"="Run_4","lambda_5"="Run_5")) + 
  scale_x_log10() +
  xlab("Time (years, log scale)") +
  ylab("Cross-coalescence rate") + ggtitle("Iran-North Dakota") +
  theme_minimal()
personal_theme = theme(plot.title = 
                         element_text(hjust = 0.5))
p.cross_Ir_ND + personal_theme
```
